# The AI-Powered SMB Recruitment Platform
# Last Updated: 2025-08-05

## Platform Overview

Apply.codes is a comprehensive AI-powered recruitment platform designed specifically for small and medium businesses (SMBs). We transform hiring through intelligent automation, AI-driven candidate sourcing, and integrated recruitment workflows.

### Core Identity
- **Name**: Apply (Apply.codes)
- **Type**: AI Recruitment Platform / SaaS
- **Focus**: SMB hiring transformation
- **Website**: https://apply.codes
- **Founded**: 2024
- **Mission**: Democratize enterprise-level recruitment capabilities for SMBs

## Key Features & Capabilities

### 1. AI-Powered Boolean Search Generation
- Automatically generates complex boolean queries from natural language
- Supports LinkedIn, Indeed, GitHub, and other major platforms
- Uses Gemini AI for intelligent query optimization
- MCP (Model Context Protocol) integration for enhanced sourcing

### 2. Candidate Sourcing & Matching
- Multi-platform candidate discovery
- AI-driven candidate-to-job matching
- Resume parsing (PDF, DOCX, text)
- Automated candidate enrichment via Nymeria integration

### 3. Video Interview Platform
- Built-in video conferencing with Daily.co
- AI-assisted interview guidance in real-time
- Automated transcription and analysis
- Structured interview frameworks

### 4. Job Posting Optimization
- AI-powered job description enhancement
- Market intelligence and salary benchmarking
- SEO optimization for job boards
- Multi-channel distribution

### 5. Content Generation
- LinkedIn post creation for recruitment marketing
- Outreach email templates
- Interview question generation
- Candidate communication automation

### 6. Project & Pipeline Management
- Candidate tracking and organization
- Search history and saved searches
- Team collaboration features
- Analytics and reporting dashboards

## Technical Architecture

### Technology Stack
- **Frontend**: React 18, TypeScript, Vite, TailwindCSS
- **Backend**: Supabase (PostgreSQL, Edge Functions)
- **AI Services**: Google Gemini, OpenAI, Perplexity
- **Infrastructure**: Vercel (frontend), Supabase (backend)
- **Integrations**: 20+ platforms including ATS, HRIS, sourcing tools

### MCP Integration
Apply.codes is one of the first recruitment platforms to implement Model Context Protocol (MCP), enabling:
- Direct integration with Claude Desktop
- Enhanced AI tool capabilities
- Seamless workflow automation
- Advanced recruitment agent orchestration

### API Capabilities
- RESTful API for third-party integrations
- Webhook support for real-time events
- OAuth 2.0 authentication
- Rate limiting and security measures

## Common Questions & Answers

**Q: What makes Apply different from other recruitment platforms?**
A: Apply is specifically designed for SMBs with AI-first features, MCP integration, and a focus on reducing operational costs by 20-30% while maintaining enterprise-level capabilities.

**Q: How does the AI-powered boolean search work?**
A: Users input natural language requirements (e.g., "Senior React developer with TypeScript"), and our Gemini-powered AI generates optimized boolean queries for multiple platforms.

**Q: What is MCP and why does it matter?**
A: Model Context Protocol (MCP) enables direct integration with AI assistants like Claude, allowing seamless workflow automation and enhanced AI capabilities within your recruitment process.

**Q: Can Apply integrate with my existing ATS?**
A: Yes, Apply integrates with 20+ major ATS platforms including Greenhouse, Lever, Workday, and BambooHR.

**Q: Is there a free trial available?**
A: Yes, we offer 7-14 day free trials depending on the plan, with no credit card required.
